document.full_text: britain's rory mcilroy, widely tipped as a future world number one, produced golf as dazzling as the spring sunshine at augusta national to take control of the masters on thursday.
document.title: dazzling mcilroy takes control at the masters
lines_and_colors: britain's rory mcilroy, widely tipped as a future world number one, produced golf as dazzling as the spring sunshine at augusta national to take control of the masters on thursday.
